newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: S.Africa Oct retail sales up 1.1 pct on month.
newsitem.headline: S.Africa Oct retail sales up 1.1 pct on month.

text.p: South African retail trade sales rose a seasonally adjusted 1.1 percent in October to 11.37 billion rand, latest Central Statistical Service (CSS) data shows.
Year-on-year, seasonally adjusted retail sales were up 9.4 percent from 10.39 billion rand in October 1995, the CSS said.
On an actual basis, retail trade sales were up 3.6 percent month-on-month and up 9.3 percent year-on-year.
Retail trade sales at current prices.
